info.author: SÃ©bastien Ramage
info.description:
pybi is small but powerful wrapper around Baan OLE Automation. Using AFS you can
access Baan data, create/modify/delete/print just like a normal user

there's also a built-in xmlrpc server that can be use to expose function to
another system (a web server for example) This xmlrpc server can run in
standalone or as Windows service

At this time, it is not multi-thread because I have some problem using Baan Com
object in multi-thread environnement.

Created/Tested with Baan IV
info.name: pybi
info.html_description:
pybi is small but powerful wrapper around Baan OLE Automation. Using AFS you can access Baan data, create/modify/delete/print just like a normal user

there’s also a built-in xmlrpc server that can be use to expose function to another system (a web server for example) This xmlrpc server can run in standalone or as Windows service

At this time, it is not multi-thread because I have some problem using Baan Com object in multi-thread environnement.

Created/Tested with Baan IV
